title: Mirrors Edge: Catalyst (v1.0.3.47248 + 2 DLC, MULTI9)
description:
Interface Language: Russian, French, Portuguese, Chinese, Italian, English, German, Polish, Spanish
Audio Language: Russian, French, Italian, English, German, Spanish
Crack: built-in (CPY)

Minimum requirements:
Operating System: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 (64-bits only)
Processor: Intel i3-3250 / AMD FX6350
RAM: 6 GB
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti (2GB) / AMD Radeon R9 270x (2GB)
DirectX: 11
HDD Space: 24 GB (~31 GB during installation)

DLC's :

Mirror's Edge Catalyst: a set of "Real"
Fight for freedom on a higher level using unique game items. Purchase a special appearance in the worlds of other players using a special military projection.
Stand on the leaderboard thanks Running label. Change the look of your screen break with a unique background.
